summary: Dashboard UI improvements: wrap field attribute cards into a 3-column layout, expand predefined background color options, and expand predefined icon set.
architectural_notes: 3-column layout should use wrapping behavior (auto-wrap every 3 items) for field attribute cards in the dashboard.
known_issues: Dashboard field attribute cards are currently laid out in a single row instead of wrapping into rows of 3.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix dashboard field attribute cards layout to wrap into rows of 3 (3-column wrap) instead of all in one row
Add 12 additional simple predefined background colors to the background selector
Add 100 additional hand-picked predefined icons to the icon selector/library
